messages.subject: seeing while you read
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/02 8:39:40 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Tina, Absolutely.  And if you read Household Gods by Judith Tarr and Harry Turtledove,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/02 8:39:40 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> As I read I imagine the settings, what the person looks like, their
> clothes,etc. When I see the movie made about the book I am so often
> disgusted and annoyed b/c "that's not how it's supposed to look"!
> I guess I get to wrapped up in my descriptions.
> Any one else have the same problems?
>
>
Tina,
Absolutely. And if you read "Household Gods" by Judith Tarr and Harry
Turtledove, you'll swear you can SMELL the story, too.
Mary J



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
